weekly picks (Jul 4 week 2022)

Posted on July 18, 2022 in 2022jul 

A WordCloud of 2022 Jul 4th week collection

  1. 2207.07962v1 Conservation of the particle-hole symmetry in the pseudogap state in optimally-doped Bi2Sr2CuO6+{\delta} superconductor (cuprate, arxiv)

  2. 2207.08068 Charge-loop current order and Z3 nematicity mediated by bond-order fluctuations in kagome metal AV3Sb5 (A=Cs,Rb,K) (kagome Kontani, arXiv)

  3. 2207.08243 Metallicity in the Dissipative Hubbard-Holstein Model: Markovian and Non-Markovian Tensor-Network Methods for Open Quantum Many-Body Systems (arXiv)

  4. 2207.08442 Pressure tuning domain-wall chirality in noncentrosymmetric magnetic Weyl semimetal CeAlGe (Ce, arXiv)

  5. 2207.08528 Ginzburg-Landau surface energy of multiband superconductors: Derivation and application to selected systems (arXiv)

  6. 2207.08594 Multifractally-enhanced superconductivity in two-dimensional systems with spin-orbit coupling (arXiv)

  7. 2207.08772 Josephson Diode Effect in High Mobility InSb Nanoflags (arXiv)

  8. 2207.07661 Microscopic theory of multi-stage Fermi surface reconstruction in heavy fermion systems with quartet multipolar local moments (YBKim, arXiv)

  9. 2207.07725v1 Preparing Valence-Bond-Solid states on noisy intermediate-scale quantum computers (arxiv)

  10. 2207.07926 Estimation of the on-site Coulomb potential 1 and covalent state in La2CuO4 by muon spin rotation 2 and density functional theory calculations (arXiv)

  11. 2207.08008 Mott transition, Widom line, Frenkel line and pseudogap in the half-filled triangular lattice Hubbard model (arXiv)

  12. 2207.08161 Field-linear anomalous Hall effect and Berry curvature induced by spin chirality in the kagome antiferromagnet Mn3Sn (BinghaiYan, arXiv)

  13. 2207.08228 Topological states in double monolayer graphene (arXiv)

  14. 2207.08381 Persistence of correlation-driven surface states in SmB6 under pressure (SBSeo, sarXiv)

  15. 2207.08744v1 Kondo destruction and fixed-point annihilation in a Bose-Fermi Kondo model (arxiv)

  16. 2207.08802v1 Variation of carrier density in semimetals via short-range correlation: a case study with nickelate NdNiO$_2$ (arxiv)

  17. PhysRevB.106.035127 Modeling magnetic multipolar phases in density functional theory (PRB)

  18. PhysRevB.106.014105 Displacement field splitting of defective hexagonal lattices (PRB)

  19. PhysRevB.106.014106 Berezinskii-Kosterlitz-Thouless transitions in classical and quantum long-range systems (PRB)

  20. PhysRevB.106.014412 Field-driven side-by-side magnetic domain wall dynamics in ferromagnetic nanostrips (PRB)

  21. PhysRevB.106.014511 Hot-lines topology and the fate of the spin resonance mode in three-dimensional unconventional superconductors (Trembly, PRB)

  22. PhysRevB.106.024308 Rayleigh waves and cyclotron surface modes of gyroscopic metamaterials (PRB)

  23. PhysRevB.106.024418 A-type antiferromagnetic order in semiconducting ${\mathrm{EuMg}}{2}{\mathrm{Sb}}{2}$ single crystals (PRB)

  24. PhysRevB.106.024511 Interplay of finite-energy and finite-momentum superconducting pairing (PRB)

  25. PhysRevB.106.035125 Electric field and strain-induced band-gap engineering and manipulation of the Rashba spin splitting in Janus van der Waals heterostructures (Janus Rashba, PRB)

  26. PhysRevB.106.035126 Enhanced tunneling magnetoresistance and spin filtering in perovskite magnetic tunnel junctions via oxygen octahedral tilting (PRB)

  27. PhysRevB.106.035129 Persistent exchange splitting in the chiral helimagnet ${\mathrm{Cr}}{1/3}{\mathrm{NbS}}{2}$ (PRB)

  28. PhysRevB.106.045121 Magnetic dilution effect and topological phase transitions in $({\mathrm{Mn}}{1\ensuremath{-}x}{\mathrm{Pb}}{x}){\mathrm{Bi}}{2}{\mathrm{Te}}{4}$ (MnBiTe4, PRB)

  29. PhysRevB.106.045417 Correlated disorder induced anomalous transport in magnetically doped topological insulators (PRB)

  30. PhysRevB.106.L020402 Free energy of twisting spins in ${\mathrm{Mn}}_{3}\mathrm{Sn}$ (LBalents, PRB)

  31. PhysRevB.106.L041111 Giant nonlinear Hall effect in strained twisted bilayer graphene (PRB)

  32. physics Steps toward Quantum Gravity in a Realistic Cosmos (Physics)

  33. 2207.07191 Soft-phonon and charge-density-wave formation in nematic BaNi$_2$As$_2$ (arXiv)

  34. 2207.07424 Pseudogap Suppression by Competition with Superconductivity in La-Based Cuprates (arXiv)

  35. 2207.07637 High-temperature superconductivity in hydrides (arXiv)

  36. 2207.07127 Quantum Hall valley Ferromagnets as a platform for topologically protected quantum memory (arXiv)

  37. 2207.05276 Non-Abelian topological defects and strain mapping in 2D moire materials (PKim, arXiv)

  38. 2207.07133 Thermodynamic characteristic for correlated flat-band system with quantum anomalous Hall ground state (arXiv)

  39. 2207.07375 Engineering a skyrmion crystal in ferromagnetic/antiferromagnetic bilayers free from the DM interaction (Hayami, arXiv)

  40. 2207.07448 The magnetic dynamics of NiPS$_3$ (spin wave, arXiv)
